code: import React from'react';import"./Header.css";import sigma from"../../images/sigma.png";import Menu from'../Menu/Menu';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useEffect,useContext}from'react';import AuthContext from'../AuthContext/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const menuItems=[{name:'Informacije',path:'/sigma',subMenu:[{name:'Pregled',path:'/sigma/pregled'},{name:'Detalji',path:'/sigma/detalji'},{name:'Česta Pitanja',path:'/sigma/faq'}]},{name:'Kursevi',path:'/kursevi',subMenu:[{name:'Pregled',path:'/sigma/pregled'},{name:'Detalji',path:'/sigma/detalji'},{name:'Česta Pitanja',path:'/sigma/faq'}]}];const{setScrolled}=useContext(AuthContext);let{scrolled}=useContext(AuthContext);const handleScroll=()=>{if(window.scrollY>50){setScrolled(true);}else{setScrolled(false);}};useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:scrolled?"Header__container menu-active":'Header__container',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Header__container-help",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Header__container-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:!scrolled?"img__not-scaled":"img__scaled",src:sigma,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sigma ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Academy"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Header__container-right",children:[!scrolled&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{menuItems:menuItems})]})]})});};export default Header;
